tasks.title: Build Hello World HTML page
tasks.description:
Implementation steps:
1. Navigate to /root/Playground_AI_Dev directory
2. Create index.html file with proper HTML5 boilerplate
3. Add DOCTYPE, html, head, and body tags
4. Include meta charset UTF-8 and responsive viewport
5. Add title 'Hello World Page'
6. Create main content with H1 heading 'Hello World'
7. Add a styled CSS button with class 'hello-button'
8. Include inline CSS within <style> tags in head section
9. Style body with centered flexbox layout
10. Style button with padding, background color, hover effects
11. Ensure all elements are properly closed
12. Verify HTML structure is valid
